introduction.section1: The Northern Territory is a state located in the North of Australia. It includes a large part of the Outback that we differentiate in our blog. Its capital is Darwin but you can discover many other cities like Katherine or Daly Waters.
introduction.section2: With many lakes and parks, the largest and most famous being Kakadu National Park, as well as a tropical climate, this state is a perfect spot for crocodile sightseeing. You will also have the opportunity to visit many pubs.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

title: Northern Territory
meta-description: Discover the Northern Territory, a state located in the North of Australia. Darwin, lakes with crocodiles, Kakadu National Park, Katherine, Daly Waters' pubs. Through our articles, discover different places to visit. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.
social-network-description: With many lakes and parks, the largest and most famous being Kakadu National Park, as well as a tropical climate, this state is a perfect spot for crocodile sightseeing. You will also have the opportunity to visit many pubs.
